config.Gender.name: Gender
config.Gender.description: True for using the terms "husband" and "wife". False for using "spouse".
husbands: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husbands in life!$h
wives: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wives in life!$h
spouses: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you spouses in life!$h
